fields.name: Case Load (Passive):
fields.value: Each night, any lower-scoring players who are roleblocked will be added to your case load. You will astrally roleblock them each following night until you choose to release them (as an evening action).

fields.name: Supervised Release (Passive):
fields.value: After you release a player in your case load, you will learn who they visit the next two nights. At the end of the second night, they will be removed from your case load.

fields.name: Parole Violation (0x, Charge 100%):
fields.value: Add a player previously on your caseload back to it.

fields.name: Analyze Recidivism (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Target one player on your case load. Learn one other random player they can win with, and one other random player they cannot win with.
